results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 7f2e9f5e9514451ca4196c61281fa8ab. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and regression tests are added to prevent recurrence.
arguments.problem_statement: Users cannot log in when their password contains special characters.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 44388accf78644dca7aa57dbc7e313c3:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.

arguments.title: Write fix and add regression tests
